config.description: Configuration data for LLDP global level

counters.description: Enclosing container for lldp global level counter

remote-inserts.description: Counter for number of times complete set of information advertised by a particular MSAP has been inserted into tables

remote-deletes.description: Counter for numer of times the complete set of information advertised by a particular MSAP has been deleted from tables.

remote-drops.description: Counter for number of times complete set of information advertised by a particular MSAP could not be entered into tables

remote-ageouts.description: Counter for number of times the complete set of information advertised by a particular MSAP could not be entered into tables

options.description: This attribute returns the terminal debug options which are enabled

state.description: Operational state data for lldp debug

options.description: This attribute returns the terminal debug options which are enabled

terminal-debug-status.description: Use this attribute to turn on or turn off lldp debugging at various levels.

interfaces.description: Top level container for LLDP-V2 on each interface

interface.description: List of interfaces on which LLDP is enabled / available

name.description: The textual name of the interface. The value of this object should be the name of the interface as assigned by the local device and should be suitable for use in commands entered at the device's `console'. This might be a text name, such as `le0' or a simple port number, such as `1', depending on the interface naming syntax of the device. If several entries in the ifTable together represent a single interface as named by the device, then each will have the same value of name. Note that for an agent which responds to SNMP queries concerning an interface on some other (proxied) device, then the value of name for such an interface is the proxied device's local name for it. If there is no local name, or this object is otherwise not applicable, then this object contains a zero-length string.

config.description: Configuration data for LLDP-V2 on each interface

name.description: The interface name to configure the OSPF parameters.

disable-lldp-agent.description: Use this attribute to disable LLDP on interface when it is enabled globally

agent-circuit-id.description: DHCP agent circuit ID association on interface

med-device-type.description: LLDP-MED type of interface. Class-0 is not defined, Class-1 is for generic endpoints and is applicable to all endpoints that require the base LLDP discovery services. Class-2 is for media endpoints and it includes endpoints that have IP media capabilities. Class-3 is for communication endpoints i.e., devices acting as end user communication applicances. Calss-4 is for Network Connectivity Device. Class 5-255 are Reserved

local-name.description: Interface sub type with local name

name.description: The interface name to configure the OSPF parameters.

disable-lldp-agent.description: Use this attribute to disable LLDP on interface when it is enabled globally

agent-circuit-id.description: DHCP agent circuit ID association on interface

med-device-type.description: LLDP-MED type of interface. Class-0 is not defined, Class-1 is for generic endpoints and is applicable to all endpoints that require the base LLDP discovery services. Class-2 is for media endpoints and it includes endpoints that have IP media capabilities. Class-3 is for communication endpoints i.e., devices acting as end user communication applicances. Calss-4 is for Network Connectivity Device. Class 5-255 are Reserved

local-name.description: Interface sub type with local name

pp-vlanid.description: Remote interface protocol port vlan identifier

auto-negotiation-support.description: Remote interface auto negotiation support availability, 0-Not-supported, 1-Supported, 3-Supported and Enabled

mdi-power-support.description: Remote mdi power over ethernet support information

poe-power-class.description: Remote mdi power over ethernet class

type-source-priority.description: Remote Bit map value of type/source/priority

pd-requested-power.description: Remote powered device requested power value

pse-allocated-power.description: Remote power sourcing equipment allocated power value

vlan-list.description: Object list for vlan-list operational state

vlan-id.description: The integer value used to identify the port's VLAN identifier associated with the remote system. If the remote system either does not know the PVID or does not support port-based VLAN operation, the value of this attribute could be 0.

vlan-name.description: The string used to identify the port's configured vlan name with remote system

management-list.description: Object list for neighbor management information

address.description: The value of Remote management ip/mac/unknown address

agents.description: Top level container for lldp agents

agent-type.description: LLDP agent type on this interface

config.description: Configuration data for LLDP agent on each interface

agent-type.description: LLDP agent type on this interface

enable-tx-rx.description: Enables interface with LLDP protocol and specifies to send and(or) receive packets on interface

dcbx-enable.description: Use this attribute to enable/disable DCBX on the given interface

agent-type.description: LLDP agent type on this interface

enable-tx-rx.description: Enables interface with LLDP protocol and specifies to send and(or) receive packets on interface

dcbx-enable.description: Use this attribute to enable/disable DCBX on the given interface

transmit.description: Enclosing container for configuration and state data LLDP packet    transmission

config.description: Configuration data for LLDP agent on each interface

reinit-delay.description: The minimum time interval an LLDP port waits before re-initializing an LLDP transmission

message-tx-interval.description: The delay between successive LLDP frame transmissions during normal transmission periods

message-tx-hold-multiplier.description: Multiplier of message-tx-interval to determine the Time To Live (TTL) that is carried in LLDP frames transmitted by the LLDP agent

message-fast-tx.description: The interval at which LLDP frames are transmitted on behalf of LLDP agent during fast transmission periods

tx-credit-max.description: The maximum number of consecutive LLDPDUs that can be transmitted at any time

tx-fast-init.description: The number of LLDPDUs to send during the fast transmission periods

reinit-delay.description: The minimum time interval an LLDP port waits before re-initializing an LLDP transmission

message-tx-interval.description: The delay between successive LLDP frame transmissions during normal transmission periods

message-tx-hold-multiplier.description: Multiplier of message-tx-interval to determine the Time To Live (TTL) that is carried in LLDP frames transmitted by the LLDP agent

message-fast-tx.description: The interval at which LLDP frames are transmitted on behalf of LLDP agent during fast transmission periods

tx-credit-max.description: The maximum number of consecutive LLDPDUs that can be transmitted at any time

tx-fast-init.description: The number of LLDPDUs to send during the fast transmission periods

tx-ttl.description: The time to live value used in message transmission based on message-tx-interval and message-tx-hold-multiplier values

counters.description: Enclosing container for LLDP transmit counters

frames-out.description: The number of LLDP frames transmitted by this LLDP agent on the indicated port to the destination

receive.description: Enclosing container for configuration and state data for LLDP packet    reception

config.description: Configuration data for LLDP agent on each interface

neighbor-limit.description: This attribute configures limit for remote table entries to take action to discard or delete entries

neighbor-timer.description: This attribute configures timer to discard received message when remote table is full

port-mac.description: This attribute uses given port MAC to take action when the remote table is full

port-timer.description: This attribute configures timer to discard or delete existing info for received message port MAC when the remote table is full

neighbor-limit.description: This attribute configures limit for remote table entries to take action to discard or delete entries

neighbor-timer.description: This attribute configures timer to discard received message when remote table is full

port-mac.description: This attribute uses given port MAC to take action when the remote table is full

port-timer.description: This attribute configures timer to discard or delete existing info for received message port MAC when the remote table is full

frames-aged-out.description: The number of LLDP frames aged out on interface

frames-discarded.description: The number of LLDP frames discarded on interface. This counter can provide an indication that LLDP header formatting problems may exist with the local LLDP agent in the sending system or that LLDPDU validation problems may exist with the local LLDP agent in the receiving system

frames-invalid.description: The number of invalid LLDP frames received by this LLDP agent on interface

frames-valid.description: The number of valid LLDP frames received by this LLDP agent on interface

tlvs-discarded.description: The number of LLDP TLVs discarded for any reason by this LLDP agent on interace

tlvs-unrecognized.description: The number of LLDP TLVs received on the given port that are not recognized by this LLDP agent on interface. An unrecognized TLV is referred to as the TLV whose type value is in the range of reserved TLV types (000 1001 - 111 1110) in Table 9.1 of IEEE Std 802.1AB-2004. An unrecognized TLV may be a basic management TLV from a later LLDP version

port-id.description: This attribute specifies sub type of the port id TLV. Can be configured as if-alias or mac-address or ip-address or if-name or agent-circuit-id or locally assigned name

chassis-id.description: This attribute specifies chassis ID subtype for the LLDP agent on a port. Can be configured as if-alias or ip-address or mac-address or if-name or locally-assgined name
